revised_title: Determination of the Number of Electrostatic Units in the Electromagnetic Unit
tldr: The authors describe their experiments to determine the relationship between the fundamental units in the electromagnetic and electrostatic systems of absolute measurement. They used an electrodynamometer and an absolute electrometer to measure the force of attraction between two disks and the difference of potentials between the poles of a battery, ultimately expressing the results in terms of mass, time, and space units.
